description: Details of arrangements put in place to secure the redevelopment of the site permitted under planning permission ref PP/2011/5230 pursuant to condition 2 of conservation area consent ref: PP/2011/5257 dated 27/04/2012 for Demolition of the Acton Baths building and substantial demolition of the Kings Rooms (retention of Acton Baths Chimney and the Kings Rooms facade facing High Street) to facilitate the construction of a three storey building comprising replacement swimming pool and learner pool with associated changing facilities, studio spaces, fitness suite, community facilities and reception hall located behind the retained Kings Rooms fatade and attached to the Town Hall Extension; change of use of the Town Hall Extension to a service centre on the ground floor and library on the first floor and associated cycle storage and waste and recycling facilities
